verses.name: Ezekiel 23:9
verses.text: Wherefore I have delivered her into the hand of her lovers, into the hand of the Assyrians, upon whom she doted.

verses.name: Ezekiel 23:10
verses.text: These discovered her nakedness: they took her sons and her daughters, and slew her with the sword: and she became famous among women; for they had executed judgment upon her.

verses.name: Ezekiel 23:11
verses.text: And when her sister Aholibah saw this, she was more corrupt in her inordinate love than she, and in her whoredoms more than her sister in her whoredoms.
